project1.catch: Multilingual Learning Support Web App Using YouTube Subtitles and Generative AI
project1.desc: Focusing on the compatibility of Japanese and Korean subtitles and the similarities in grammar and vocabulary, we are developing a language learning website where fans can share and accumulate learning data and commentary through otaku content.

python_django.name: Python / Django
python_django.note: I used Python to develop a YouTube subtitle analysis tool during university, and since most YouTube-related information is available in Python, I chose to use it for this project.

typescript_vue.name: TypeScript / Vue.js
typescript_vue.note: I chose Vue.js to learn it through personal development, as I had no experience with it at work.
